}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:18.220
    | text      = But there are a couple problems with Alex's story that he's telling here about this Larry
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:21.579
    | text      = Summers memo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:22.579
    | text      = Like what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.579
    | text      = Right off the bat, there's the problem that he's saying that Wikipedia has a link to it,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:26.700
    | text      = which suggests that his research process was just to make sure there was something on Wikipedia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:30.559
    | text      = about the memo, then forget that there's a second step that he needs to make.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:34.059
    | text      = It seems like that's good enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:35.460
    | text      = It wasn't in his Encarta CD anymore, so he couldn't find it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:38.619
    | text      = The second problem is that if you read the Wikipedia entry about this memo, the second
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:42.720
    | text      = paragraph on the page, you just get down to the second paragraph, you find an explanation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:48.220
    | text      = that one, Larry Summers didn't write the memo, two, the guy who did write it insists that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:53.900
    | text      = in its proper context, the memo was meant to be satirical and a means to prompt interdepartmental
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:59.500
    | text      = debate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:00.500
    | text      = And three, the version of the memo that was leaked in 1992 was doctored specifically to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:04.960
    | text      = remove context to make it seem like those proposals that were being made were serious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:09.059
    | text      = Right, right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:10.180
    | text      = So somebody edited a modest proposal to make it look like they really wanted to eat those
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:14.140
    | text      = fucking babies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:15.140
    | text      = More or less.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:16.140
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.140
    | text      = In a piece for The New Yorker, the author of the memo, Lant Pritchard, who worked as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:20.640
    | text      = an assistant to Summers, is interviewed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:23.579
    | text      = Lant?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:24.579
    | text      = Pritchard?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:25.579
    | text      = Lant?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:26.579
    | text      = Lant?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.579
    | text      = Oh, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:28.579
    | text      = Why do we always have weird ass names on this show?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:29.819
    | text      = It's wall to wall.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:31.059
    | text      = Quote, I strongly recommended that he say I had written it and that he had just signed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.500
    | text      = it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:36.500
    | text      = Larry said, no, that wasn't his style.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:38.339
    | text      = Whatever he signed, he would take responsibility for, and he took the flak.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:41.900
    | text      = In 2001, Pritchard spoke to the Harvard magazine and specifically laid out what had happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:47.299
    | text      = Basically, the summation of his explanation is this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:50.940
    | text      = Summers had requested that he read over the World Bank's Global Economic Prospects report,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:55.019
    | text      = which was largely about trade liberalization that year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.940
    | text      = He was then tasked with writing a memo to Summers, analyzing the arguments, which ended
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:01.980
    | text      = up being seven pages long.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:04.220
    | text      = One of the points Pritchard found dubious was the World Bank's argument that free trade
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:08.019
    | text      = would naturally and specifically, like automatically, lead to environmental benefits in developing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:14.619
    | text      = countries.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:15.619
    | text      = Quote, he questioned the data supporting that claim and in criticism wrote as an ironic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:19.579
    | text      = aside, suggestions that if in conventional economic terms, dumping pollutants on poor
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:25.099
    | text      = countries would be welfare enhancing for the world as a whole, the bank ought to endorse
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:30.019
    | text      = that policy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:31.019
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:32.019
    | text      = The memo was then sent to Summers who scanned it and he signed off on it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:35.500
    | text      = Quote, thereafter, Pritchard says, someone with access to the memo doctored it, combined
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:40.660
    | text      = the heading and the sentences on pollution and toxic waste, shorn of their context and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:44.779
    | text      = the intended irony.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:46.420
    | text      = This one page form appearing to be a policy proposal, the memo then found its way into
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:51.880
    | text      = the pages of The Economist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:53.779
    | text      = The version of the memo that Alex has read is the doctored one page version, not the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:57.759
    | text      = version that is the actual memo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:00.019
    | text      = All he knows is that there's a Wikipedia article about it and that's good enough for him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:04.900
    | text      = He has no idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:05.900
    | text      = He's read the propaganda version of this from 1992 as opposed to the real version and he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:12.259
    | text      = claims that he's a scholar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:13.299
    | text      = That sounds about right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:14.299
    | text      = Did they find out who doctored the memo or did that guy get away with it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:41.539

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:52.380

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:55.179
    | text      = Alex Jones is clearly at least a spiritual extension of the militia of Montana, as he

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:11.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:18.260
    | text      = But the question is a little bit more complicated than just saying like, it's this guy or whatever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:23.019
    | text      = Though the Rocky Mountain Rendezvous happened in 1992, it was before the election that year,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:27.840
    | text      = the militias did not officially begin their organization until mid 1993 into early 1994
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:33.739
    | text      = after the election of Bill Clinton, the first Democrat president since 1981.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:38.420
    | text      = If you take Carter out of the equation, Clinton was the first Democratic president since LBJ
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:42.780
    | text      = and the Civil Rights Act and the Voting Rights Act.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:45.300
    | text      = The rise of militias was as much about preemptively fighting against any further expansion of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = human rights to non-white citizens as it was about anything else.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:53.420
    | text      = But they were too hard and they were too fast and they overplayed their hand with Timothy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:57.300
    | text      = McVeigh, whether or not it's like they intentionally sent him out to do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:01.300
    | text      = I'm not making that argument.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:02.300

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:06.239
    | text      = After the bombing of the Murrah Building, the government was forced to pay attention
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:09.179
    | text      = to militia activity and it hurt their ability to do much more than produce propaganda.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:13.900
    | text      = The Montana militia living on through Alex kept the embers burning until the time was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:19.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:41.300

    | timestamp = 01:05:43.619

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:45.500

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:02.739

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:46.860

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:59.860
    | text      = Timothy McVeigh screwed things up for the militias for a long time and forced them into
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:15.099
    | text      = Because they'd spent years insisting the OKC bombing was a conspiracy, they'd created a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I think that's where we find ourselves in 2012.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
